description: A new NASA-led study reveals that Greenland’s melting glaciers are fueling life in the Arctic Ocean. Each summer, massive freshwater plumes from glaciers like Jakobshavn drag deep-sea nutrients upward, boosting phytoplankton growth by up to 40%. These microscopic organisms form the base of the marine food web and play a key role in carbon absorption. Using NASA's ECCO-Darwin digital ocean model, researchers simulated the interaction of meltwater, currents, and marine biology. As melting accelerates, this biological boost could shift how oceans trap carbon, with global climate implications.
title: Greenland's Melting Glaciers Feed Ocean Life, Study Finds

description: Malayalam drama JSK, starring Suresh Gopi and Anupama Parameswaran, will stream on Zee5 from August 15, 2025. Following its theatrical release and mixed reception, the film is ready for its OTT audience. It follows interconnected characters navigating personal and moral challenges, leading to an intense climax.
title: JSK OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Malayalam Movie Online?

description: Set in the 1990s, following a political rivalry, Mayasabha starts as a story of two childhood friends who, as they grow up, lead two separate political parties. Following the themes of power, ambition, and betrayal, the two keep beating each other to win the position of chair of the CM. The series is set to premiere on Sony LIV.
title: Mayasabha Now Streaming on SonyLIV: Everything You Need to Know

description: NASA is accelerating plans to deploy a 100-kilowatt nuclear reactor on the Moon by 2030, according to interim head Sean Duffy. The reactor would ensure steady power through long lunar nights and help secure water-ice resources at the Moon’s south pole. China and Russia also aim for lunar reactors by the mid-2030s, sparking a geopolitical “moon race.” NASA is mandating key steps within 60 days, including appointing a reactor program manager. Despite ambitious goals, funding remains a hurdle, with NASA’s proposed 2026 budget at historic lows and cuts hitting science programs and staffing.
title: NASA Aims to Deploy Nuclear Reactor on Moon by 2030 for Strategic Power

description: NASA has awarded Firefly Aerospace a $176.7 million contract for a groundbreaking 2029 mission to the moon’s south pole. The CLPS mission will deploy multiple rovers and scientific instruments to explore permanently shadowed regions, analyze lunar regolith, and search for water ice—key steps toward supporting Artemis program goals and enabling future crewed missions on the moon and beyond.
title: NASA Awards Firefly $177M for 2029 Mission to Deliver Rovers to Moon’s South Pole

description: Researchers have tracked a significant increase in the use of ChatGPT in scientific writing, especially in computer science and competitive research fields. By analyzing over a million papers, they found patterns linked to author habits, paper length, and geography. The findings raise broader discussions about the role of AI in research and the integrity of scientific publications.
title: Study Reveals Growing Use of ChatGPT in Scientific Papers Across Multiple Disciplines

description: Sony sees a tariff impact of JPY 70 billion, compared to jpy 100 billion forecast in May. It said the estimated impact is based on tariff rates as of August 1 and that the situation remained fluid.
title: Sony Sells 2.5 Million PS5 Units in Q1 FY 2025, Hikes Profit Forecast

description: Don’t miss The Legend of Hanuman, a highly praised animated series available on JioHotstar. Featuring the voices of Sharad Kelkar and others, the show brings to life the epic tale of Hanuman’s devotion, battles, and transformation. Viewers have applauded its animation, emotional depth, and faithful representation of Indian mythology.
title: The Legend of Hanuman Season 6 Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know

description: Pixel Watch 4 renders have leaked online. The alleged renders suggest five different colour options for the wearable. It could be available in 41mm and 45mm sizes. The 41mm is shown in Iris, Lemongrass, Porcelain, and Obsidian, while the 45mm is shown in Moonstone, Porcelain, and Obsidian shades.
title: Google Pixel Watch 4 Leaked Images Reveal Design From Various Angles, Five Colour Options

description: iQOO Z10 Turbo+ 5G has been unveiled in China. The smartphone is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chip, coupled with an 8,000mAh battery. It sports a 6.78-inch display with 1,260x2,800 pixel resolution and 144Hz refresh rate. The Chinese smartphone manufacturer offers the phone in three colour options and four RAM and storage configurations. It ships with an in-display optical fingerprint sensor for unlocking the handset.
title: iQOO Z10 Turbo+ 5G Launched With 8,000mAh Battery, Dimensity 9400+ SoC: Price, Specifications

description: Lenovo Idea Tab has been launched with a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset. It has an 11-inch display with  2.5K resolution and a 90Hz refresh rate. It is backed by a 7,040mAh battery with 20W charging support. It is currently up for sale in the country via Amazon and the Lenovo India website.
title: Lenovo Idea Tab With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 7,040mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Lenovo has introduced refreshed LOQ gaming laptops in India with up to AMD Ryzen 7 250 or Intel Core i7-14700HX CPUs and Nvidia GeForce RTX 50 series GPUs, including the RTX 5060 with 8GB GDDR7 VRAM. They offer up to 32GB RAM, up to 1TB storage, and 15.6-inch WQHD displays with up to 165Hz refresh rate. They include a 5-megapixel webcam, an RGB or white backlit keyboard, a Lenovo LA1 AI chip, Hyperchamber cooling, and a 60Wh battery with 245W charging support.
title: Lenovo LOQ Laptops Refreshed With Up to 14th Gen Intel Core i7 CPU, Nvidia GeForce RTX 5060 GPU

description: Motorola announced on Wednesday that Microsoft’s Copilot Vision feature will be integrated into the moto AI suite of features. The Lenovo-owned smartphone brand said the onboarding of the Copilot feature is an extension of the existing partnership with Microsoft. With this, the company will offer users with a moto AI-enabled device to access the artificial intelligence (AI)-powered computer vision technology in select countries.
title: Motorola Adds Microsoft’s Copilot Vision to Moto AI Suite; Copilot App to Be Preinstalled on Upcoming Devices

description: Indian Railways has brought a new facility enabling last-minute ticket bookings on Vande Bharat Express trains. Travellers can now book seats up to 15 minutes before departure from their boarding station. This article will tell you how to reserve a seat just before the train departs.
title: Know How to Book Tickets on Vande Bharat Trains Just 15 Minutes Before Departure

description: Lenovo Xiaoxin Tablet Pro GT has been unveiled in China with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC and an 11.1-inch display. Along with this, the company has also launched two more Xiaoxin-series tablets called the Xiaoxin Tablet 12.1 and Tablet 11 5G. Two of the three new tablets are available in three colour options.
title: Lenovo Xiaoxin Tablet Pro GT With Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 Launched Alongside Two Other Xiaoxin-Series Tablets

description: Microsoft introduced a new artificial intelligence (AI) agent on Tuesday that can autonomously analyse and classify malware. Dubbed Project Ire, the AI system is currently available as a prototype, although the Redmond-based tech giant has tested its capabilities in both controlled environments as well as in real-world scenarios. It can fully reverse engineer a software without human intervention and conduct analysis at multiple levels to assess whether a software is benign or malware.
title: Microsoft Unveils Project Ire AI Agent That Autonomously Detects, Classifies Malware

description: Redmi 15C 5G renders had recently surfaced online, revealing the alleged design of the rumoured phone. Now, the phone has reportedly received 3C certification, signalling its imminent launch in China. Leaked renders of the handset suggest that the phone could sport a display with a water drop-style notch to house the selfie camera.
title: Redmi 15C 5G Spotted On 3C Certification Website Ahead Of Anticipated Launch in China

description: Samsung’s 2025 Q-series soundbars, including the HW-Q990F and HW-QS700F, feature AI Sound Optimisation, Dynamic Bass Control, and Active Voice Amplifier Pro for enhanced audio. They include a Convertible Fit Design with Gyro Sensors for position-based tuning and a compact 6.5-inch wireless subwoofer. Q-Symphony Pro and Wireless Dolby Atmos offer immersive, cable-free surround sound. The soundbars support SmartThings, Alexa, Google Assistant, Chromecast, AirPlay, and Roon Ready, along with Bluetooth 5.3, HDMI, Wi-Fi, high-resolution playback, and a dedicated Game Pro mode.
title: Samsung HW-Q990F and HW-QS700F Soundbars Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: OpenAI’s upcoming artificial intelligence (AI) model, GPT-5, has reportedly been leaked ahead of release. As per the report, the models were listed in a now-deleted GitHub blog post, along with certain details about them. The post reportedly mentions four variants, which includes the previously reported GPT-5 base model, GPT-5 Mini, GPT-5 Nano, and a new GPT-5 Chat, which is said to be for enterprise usage.
title: GPT-5 AI Models, Features and Availability Reportedly Leaked by GitHub Ahead of Launch

description: Moto G06 has reportedly been listed with the model number XT2535 on the FCC and IMEI databases, with regional variants. It is expected to feature a 5,100mAh battery with 10W charging and carry the codename Lagos. The phone will likely support 5.8GHz Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and LTE connectivity. The Geekbench listings suggest a MediaTek Helio G81 Extreme SoC, 4GB RAM, and Android 15-based Hello UI. It may launch in Arabesque, Tapestry, and Tendril colourways, priced between EUR 122.90 (roughly Rs. 12,000) and EUR 169.90 (roughly Rs. 17,000).
title: Moto G06 Spotted on Geekbench and Multiple Certification Sites; Expected to Feature 5,100mAh Battery

description: Samsung has announced that it is updating the on-screen search experience for its 2025 range of TVs within its Vision AI ecosystem. It brings an enhanced version of the Bixby voice assistant, which is claimed to be designed to offer a more conversational and personalised experience to users.
title: Samsung Smart TVs Updated With Enhanced On-Screen AI Search via Bixby Voice Assistant

description: NASA’s Crew-10 mission is wrapping up as four astronauts prepare to leave the ISS aboard the SpaceX Crew Dragon Endurance on Aug. 7, 2025. After undocking at 12:05 p.m. EDT, the capsule will autonomously navigate reentry, with splashdown expected near California around 11:58 a.m.
title: SpaceX Crew-10 Astronauts Set to Return from International Space Station Aboard Dragon Capsule

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 is scheduled to conclude today. While the sale event is live, the e-commerce platform is offering discounts on a range of electronics. Along with direct price cuts, the US-based company is also giving additional bank offers, easy EMI options, and exchange deals to its Prime members and others.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on High-Performance Laptops From Microsoft, Lenovo, Asus, and More

description: Apple has confirmed that all cover glass for iPhones and Apple Watches will soon be made at Corning’s Harrodsburg plant in Kentucky, marking the first time global units will use US-made glass. The facility, now fully dedicated to Apple, is the world’s largest smartphone glass production line and will see a 50 percent workforce increase. Apple and Corning will also open an Innovation Centre at the plant.
title: Apple Says All iPhone and Apple Watch Models Will Feature Cover Glass Manufactured in the US

description: The new pledge raises Apple's total domestic investment commitment in the US to $600 billion over the next four years. Earlier this year, the company announced it would invest $500 billion and hire 20,000 workers across the country in that period.
title: Apple to Invest Additional $100 Billion in the US, Raising Total Investment to $600 Billion Over Next 4 Years

description: Google defended its artificial intelligence (AI) features in Search amid growing concerns about their role in declining website traffic. On Wednesday, the Mountain View-based tech giant said that third-party reports suggesting a drop in search traffic are inaccurate and based on “flawed methodologies.” It defended features such as AI Overviews and the recently added AI Mode by stating that these features ensure websites are receiving “more quality clicks.”
title: Google Defends AI Search Features, Claims They Provide 'More Quality Clicks' as Traffic Declines

description: Google is reportedly expanding its new artificial intelligence (AI) search experience, AI Mode, to Android tablets. As per the report, the Mountain View-based tech giant is rolling out AI Mode to the larger display devices with the latest update to the Google app. Tablets typically tend to get new features later than smartphones and desktop interfaces due to size optimisation requirements.
title: Google Search's AI Mode Is Reportedly Rolling Out to Android Tablets

description: Poco M7 Plus 5G will be launched in India next week, the company announced on Thursday. It is expected to arrive as the latest entry into the Poco M7 5G series which already includes two models — the Poco M7 5G and the Poco M7 Pro 5G. The upcoming handset is teased to debut with silicon carbon battery technology, featuring a 7,000mAh battery.
title: Poco M7 Plus 5G India Launch Date Announced: Expected Price, Specifications

description: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 FE could launch soon. Ahead of the formal debut, it appears that Samsung has accidentally listed the TWS earphones on its official website, revealing design and price details. It was shown in two colour options, and it is expected to make its debut alongside the upcoming Galaxy S25 FE handset.
title: Samsung Galaxy Buds 3 FE Price, Design Briefly Revealed via Listing on Company's Website

description: The Amazon Great Freedom Festival 2025 sale, which began on July 31 and ends tonight, features major discounts on home appliances like smart TVs and ACs, as well as personal gadgets such as smartphones, laptops, and tablets. We have now highlighted the top deals on audio wearables, from premium headphones to budget TWS earphones. SBI credit card users and EMI buyers get 10 percent off, with coupon discount worth Rs. 500 and cashback offers of up to Rs. 2,000 also available.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Best Deals on Headphones and TWS Earphones Before the Sale Ends

description: Amazon is offering great deals on a wide range of microwave ovens on its platform during the ongoing Amazon Great Freedom Festival 2025. If you are looking for a new microwave, then this article is meant for you. We have handpicked some of the top deals on microwave ovens during the sale.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 Ends Tonight: Top Deals on Kitchen Appliances

description: While it's too early to say, EA seems to have a hit on its hands with Battlefield 6. The first open beta of the much-anticipated military shooter has attracted over 20,000 concurrent players on Steam ahead of Early Access starting on August 7. Battlefield 6 will launch across PC, PS5, and Xbox Series S/X on October 10.
title: Battlefield 6 First Open Beta Sees Players Lining Up in Thousands Ahead of Early Access

description: Google on Wednesday announced an offer for university students in the US and more regions. It will provide a complimentary subscription to its AI Pro plan for a period of one year. The subscription will grant them access to Google’s advanced artificial intelligence (AI) features and tools across apps such as Gemini, Docs, Sheets, and NotebookLM. In the coming weeks, it will also be expanded to include more countries.
title: Google AI Pro Plan Goes Free for a Year for Students in the US, Japan and More Countries

description: Instagram is rolling out a new update for its app on both iOS and Android devices. The latest update brings three new features to the photo and video sharing app, which are claimed to improve the way a user interacts with others on Instagram.
title: Instagram Map With Location Sharing Rolls Out Alongside TikTok-Inspired Friends Tab and Reposts

description: Google Pixel 10 series will be launched on August 20. As we wait for the formal launch, official-looking renders of the Pixel 10 and Pixel 10 Pro XL have surfaced on the Web. The Pixel 10 series is said to come with a Gemini-powered Camera Coach feature, as well as other AI powered features found on other Pixel smartphones.
title: Google Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro XL Renders Leaked; New Lineup Said to Offer Camera Coach Feature

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale ends tonight, which means deals on a wide range of electronics, including popular smartphones like the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra and iPhone 15 will be gone in a few hours. You can also find great discounts on the iPad Air (M3) and the M1 MacBook Air. Don't forget to use bank card offers and exchange your old devices for extra savings before the sale ends.
title: Amazon Freedom Sale 2025 LIVE: Last-Minute Deals on iPhone 15, Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra and More Before the Sale Ends

description: The Google Pixel 10 series, including the base model, is expected to feature AI-powered tools like Conversational Photo Editing and Camera Coach, both backed by Google Gemini. Conversational Photo Editing will let users change backgrounds, remove objects, and more using voice commands, and will reportedly be exclusive to the Pixel 10 lineup at launch. Camera Coach is expected to help users take better photos in real time.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series to Offer Gemini-Powered Conversational Photo Editing Feature: Report

description: The iPhone 17 Air is expected to be the newest addition to Apple’s iPhone lineup this year. It has been rumoured to arrive as a competitor to the Galaxy S25 Edge — Samsung’s ultra-thin smartphone. In recent months, the rumour mill has provided us with quite a bit of information about the purported handset. Reports have hinted towards a build that is just 5.5mm thin.
title: iPhone 17 Air Leaks: From 120Hz ProMotion Display to 5.5mm Thin Form Factor, What to Expect

description: Samsung Galaxy A17 5G was launched in select markets on Wednesday. The handset arrives as the successor to the Galaxy A16 5G, with several upgrades in tow. It is powered by a 5nm Exynos 1330 processor and will ship with One UI 7 based on Android 15. The handset sports a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED screen with a 90Hz refresh rate. Samsung has equipped it with a 50-megapixel camera as part of a dual rear camera setup.
title: Samsung Galaxy A17 5G With Exynos 1330 SoC Launched: Price, Specifications

description: ChatGPT vs Gemini vs Claude: Ever since these artificial intelligence (AI) chatbots have been released, they have been regularly compared against each other. Looking at them at the surface level, you might think that there is not a lot separating these AI bots from one another. However, a closer inspection would tell you that each of them thrives in some specific tasks, while struggling in others.
title: ChatGPT vs Gemini vs Claude: Best AI Chatbot for Everyday Use Compared
